reviewText:
Actually I have not seen this DVD because it won't play.  I have ordered this set twice from 2 different dealers, and neither set would play.  There must be something wrong in the manfacturing.

Now I am out of pocket ($) for buying 2 DVD sets that I cannot view.

DAR
When i read the info on this DVD it said region 1 but, when i receive it the DVD said it was region 0. So now either i buy a DVD player that plays different regions or return it.

After 2 sets these turned out to be Region 0, would not play in my Sony Blu Ray player which plays both DVD types, Have had problems before with Region 0, Region 1 is the designated region fot the US and Canada.
